forgot.title: Reset your password
forgot.description: Enter your email, we will send you a password reset link.
forgot.checkEmail: Check your email, we have sent you a link to reset your password.

register.title: Create a new account
register.success: Check your email to complete the register process.

forgotPasswordMail.subject: Password reset
forgotPasswordMail.description: You requested the recovery of your account, to finish click on the link below. If you did not requested a new password, just ignore this email.
forgotPasswordMail.redirect: Click here to change your password

errors.emailInUse: This email is already in use

errors.failedOnSendMail: An error has occurred on send the email
